products.name: Women's Polo
products.description: Designed for both style and performance, this aqua-colored crop polo is made from vertical knit fabric for a sleek, breathable feel. Featuring dye-to-match buttons and a reflective heat transfer label, it blends functionality with a modern edge. The regular fit offers a comfortable yet flattering silhouette, making it perfect for active and casual wear.

products.name: Women's Polo
products.description: Crafted from double knit fabric, this sky-colored polo offers a perfect blend of comfort and durability. The contrast piping on the side panel adds a sporty edge, while dye-to-match buttons and a reflective heat transfer label enhance the sleek design. With its regular fit, this polo is ideal for both active and casual wear.

products.name: Women T-shirt
products.description: This drop shoulder Lee t-shirt is a must-have for your casualwear collection. Made from 100% cotton, it features a boxy crop fit and a logo graphic print that will make you stand out. Wear it with skinny jeans, perfect for a day out with friends or a night out with your partner.

products.name: Women T-shirt
products.description: This yellow t-shirt from Lee is a unique option to add to your casualwear collection. Made from 100% cotton, it is soft and comfortable to wear. The boxy crop design and short, drop shoulder sleeves give it a trendy look. Team it up with denim shorts and sandals for a beachy vibe.

products.name: Kids' Basketball Sequin Sweatshirt
products.description: Let your little athlete shine with this stylish basketball-themed sweatshirt! Featuring a fun sequin design of a basketball hoop and ball, this sweatshirt is perfect for young sports lovers. Made from a soft and breathable fabric, it ensures comfort while keeping them warm during chilly days. The ribbed cuffs and hem provide a snug fit, making it ideal for active kids.

products.name: Mickey Mouse Sweatshirt
products.description: Let your little one show off their confidence with this stylish Mickey Mouse sweatshirt! Featuring a bold graphic print with the phrase "I MAKE AWESOME LOOK EASY", this sweatshirt is perfect for kids who love to stand out. Designed in a vibrant red color, it adds a fun and energetic vibe to any outfit. The soft, cozy fabric ensures all-day comfort, making it ideal for everyday wear, school, or casual outings. products.description: Introducing our Relaxed Fit Cargo Pants, designed for ultimate comfort and functionality. products.description: Elevate your wardrobe with these cream corduroy trousers, designed for both comfort and style. Crafted from soft corduroy, these trousers feature a classic solid pattern and a regular length for versatile wear.
